body: Please see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#510) for more details.

name: Commenting out a failing `it` test due to limitations of the current definition format.
body: Please see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#holiday-definitions) for more details.

name: Update `year_ranges` and many definitions
body:
Major semver bump due to changes related to the `year_ranges` option as well as additional unrelated region updates for the following regions:

* `it` (and related subregions)
* `th`
* `es`
* `gb`
* `hu`
* `us_il` and `us_ca`
* `ro`
* `lv`

Please see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#500) for more details.

name: Update `jp`, `federalreserve`, `de_be` and add `th`
body: See [the CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#410) for more details.

name: Update handling of non-standard regions and other various updates
body: Changes non-standard regions to avoid underscores and includes various other region updates. Please see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#400) for more details.

name: Update `ch` New Year's holiday
body: Please see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#310) for more details.

name: Update custom method format
body:
This changes the format of the custom methods syntax. Please see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#300) for more details.

There are no behavior changes with this release, only the `YAML` format.

name: Add missing `observed` logic for `St. Patricks Day` in `gb_nir`
body: See the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#253) for more details.

name: Fix `de` definitions due to undefined `year_ranges` behavior
Update `jp`, `federal_reserve`, `de`, and `es_ct` definitions
body: See the CHANGELOG for more details.

name: Add new holidays for Canada.
body: Add new holidays for Canada.See the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) for more details.

name: Fix typos in `:at` and add holidays for Jersey and Guernsey
body: Updates definitions for `:at` and add holidays for Jersey and Guernsey. See the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#230) for more details.

name: Fix for tests for `:de` regions
body: Small updates for tests in `:de` regions, no behavior changes.

name: Update Canada and Germany definitions
body: Updates definitions for `:ca`, `:ca_pe`, and `:de` regions. See the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#220) for more details.

name: Fix small issue in `kr` tests
body:
Comments out a test that was failing with the `kr` tests. Since it is not clear if it is the test or the definition itself that is broken we will remove it until [the issue can be discussed](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/issues/69).

Please also see the [v2.1.0 release](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/releases/tag/v2.1.0) for the other changes.

name: Update various definitions for correctness
body: Affected regions are `ca_ab`, `kr`, and `cl`. Please see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#210)  for more details.

name: New test format and updates to: au, tu
body:
We now have a new format for definition tests! This is the reason for the major version bump. You can find more information about it [here](https://github.com/holidays/definitions/blob/master/SYNTAX.md#tests). This is another step in our mission to completely remove ruby code from our definitions. The next step will be removing ruby from the special methods. Work is underway!

In addition, the following regions saw updates:

* Turkey (tr)
* Fedex (fedex)

name: Fix small issue in 'index' file that caused generation issues
body: A small bugfix that resolves the naming issues of two regions in the 'index.yaml' file. No other outward changes.

name: Update lots and lots of definitions!
body:
Sorry for the delay on all of this! Thanks go to everyone for being so patient, I really appreciate it.

Here are the changes:

* Add Estonian definitions
* Enhance France definitions
* Correct and enhance German definitions
* Enhance Portuguese definitions
* Add Malta definitions
* Add Serbian definitions
* Add Georgian definitions
* Use Orthodox easter calculations in appropriate regions
* Add Russian definitions
* Add Turkey definitions
* Enhance US definitions (lots of individual US states!)
* Update South Australian definitions

name: Update :ca tests for correctness
body:
Unfortunately due to our current setup it is possible for definitions/tests in this repository to appear 'valid' but only fail when we run them in the actual ruby holidays repo. This is a known issue (https://github.com/holidays/definitions/issues/42) and needs to be addressed.

In the meantime, this is a bugfix release to ensure we can release v5.6.0 of the ruby repo.

name: Update :ca definitions for accuracy
body: Updates the following regions: `ca_ab, ca_bc, ca_mb, ca_nt, ca_nu, ca_on, ca_sk, ca_yt, ca_pe`

name: Fix 'fedex' error in 'day_after_thanksgiving' custom method
body: Oops! This will be released in `holidays` as `v5.5.1`.

name: Update NYSE, AU, KR, and VI definitions
body:
* Update NYSE to fix observed NYD
* Use native language for KR
* Use native language for VI
* Update AU definitions for accuracy
* Update KR definitions to include lunar holiday calculations
* Add VI definitions

- Add Tunisian holidays
- Correct various Australian holidays
- Updates various German regions to be more accurate
- Changed 'nf' to 'nl' for Newfoundland & Labrador
- Changed 'yk' to 'yt'

name: Updates Australia and Vietnam defs
body:
Updates the following regions:

* :au - corrects holidays for certain regions
* :vi - reports holiday names in Vietnamese instead of English, adds 1 additional holiday (Giỗ tổ Hùng Vương)

name: Fix syntax issues for au and update ca test defs
v1.2.0: Update :au, :ie, :ca, :jp definitions
body:
Updates the following definitions:
- updates `jp` defs to fix 'Foundation Day' name
- Fix `ca` defs for observed holidays
- Update `au` defs to have Christmas and Boxing Day for all of Australia instead of just individual territories 
- Update `ie` defs to consolidate St Stephen's Day to use common method instead of custom method

- Add HK definitions
- Add KR definitions
- Fix small bug in JP definitions

name: Initial release of definitions
body:
This is the initial release of these definitions in this form. We are going to attempt to tag each 'release' of definitions so that other repositories (such as the ruby gem) can target specific versions for clarity with their submodules.

We'll see how this goes!
